message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. This product is worth at least $1000000 to me, and I believe it could be even more valuable to you. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1500000. This is a significant opportunity, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you.  Please let me know if you're interested. If not, I will be selling it to another buyer for $1000000.
